summary: A murder in 1944 draws together the great poets of the beat generation: Allen Ginsberg, Jack Kerouac, and William Burroughs.
cast: Daniel Radcliffe|Dane DeHaan|Michael C. Hall|Jack Huston|Ben Foster|David Cross|Jennifer Jason Leigh|Elizabeth Olsen|John Cullum|Brenda Wehle|Erin Darke|Craig Chester|Lenore Harris|Mark Ethan|Zach Appelman|David Rasche|Quinlan Corbett|Dawn Newman|Clancy O'Connor|Jon DeVries|Leslie Meisel|Sarah Hollis|Nicole Signore|Olen Holm|Michael Cavadias|Ranardo Domeico Grays|Mark Koenig|Laura Obiols|Finise Avery|Jonathan Cantor|Nick Diamantis|Matt Giroveanu|Sean Grady|Anna Kuchma|Martin Pfefferkorn|Kyra Sedgwick|Kevyn Settle|Colin Michael Walker
title: Amores asesinos
